bug.author: gpang
bug.summary: LinkageError is hit on some tables when attaching
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: 2.2.0 Describe the bug When attaching a db, sometimes it hits this: <denchmark-code>Failed to connect underDb for Alluxio db 'test': Failed to sync database test. error: java.lang.LinkageError: loader constraint violation: when resolving method "alluxio.grpc.table.Decimal$Builder.setUnscaled(Lcom/google/protobuf/ByteString;)Lalluxio/grpc/table/Decimal$Builder;" the class loader (instance of alluxio/extensions/ExtensionsClassLoader) of the current class, alluxio/table/under/hive/HiveUtils, and the class loader (instance of sun/misc/Launcher$AppClassLoader) for the method's defining class, alluxio/grpc/table/Decimal$Builder, have different Class objects for the type com/google/protobuf/ByteString used in the signature </denchmark-code>
To Reproduce Certain tables hit this error on attach. I think this happens when there are some Decimal datatypes in hive tables. Expected behavior Avoidance of this error. Urgency This prevents attaching some databases.
